statements: SELECT username, sentiment_score, post_text FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT username, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT user_id, username, post_date FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis
SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT username, post_text, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT user_id, username, post_text, sentiment_score, post_date FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE username LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY post_date ASC
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE post_text LIKE '%happy%' OR post_text LIKE '%excited%' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, username FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM social_media_posts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT post_content, sentiment_score FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, followers_count, following_count FROM user_profiles;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM social_media_posts
SELECT user_id, followers_count, following_count FROM user_profiles
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT username, followers_count FROM user_profiles WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT post_id, post_date, sentiment_score FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT * FROM social_media_users;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT user_id, content, likes_count FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 50 ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, user_id, comments_count FROM posts WHERE comments_count > 10 ORDER BY comments_count ASC;
SELECT post_id, comment_text, sentiment_score FROM comments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM social_media_users ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT posts.post_id, posts.content, comments.comment_text FROM posts JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id WHERE posts.likes_count > 100;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post_id) AS post_count FROM posts GROUP BY user_id HAVING post_count > 5;
SELECT user_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_sentiment FROM comments GROUP BY user_id HAVING average_sentiment < 0.2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM comments WHERE post_id = 2002 ORDER BY comment_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, reaction_type, reaction_date FROM reactions WHERE post_id = 3003 AND reaction_type = 'LIKE';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, comment_text, comment_date FROM comments WHERE user_id = 3 AND post_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM reactions WHERE reaction_type = 'like' AND post_id = 4 ORDER BY reaction_date ASC;

SELECT users.username, posts.post_content, comments.comment_text FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id WHERE users.user_id = 1 AND posts.post_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_id, like_date FROM likes WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY like_date ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE analysis_result = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, join_date FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, post_content, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT users.username, posts.post_content, comments.comment_content FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id;
SELECT users.username, COUNT(likes.like_id) AS total_likes FROM users LEFT JOIN likes ON users.user_id = likes.user_id GROUP BY users.user_id ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
